ti:edition.ti:label: περὶ τῆς παραπρεσβείας
ti:edition.ti:description: Demosthenis. Orationes. Vol. 1. Butcher, S. H., editor. Oxford: Clarendon Press, 1903.

ti:translation.ti:label: On the Embassy
ti:translation.ti:description: Demosthenes. Vol. II. De Corona, De Falsa Legatione, XVIII, XIX. Vince, C. A. and Vince, J. H., translators. Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 1926 (1939 reprint).
